languages.text: "Вынужден уведомить — в целях безопасности варп-секстант нуждается в полной пересборке и обновлении благословений инфокузнецами. Иначе при запуске объем накопившихся ошибок в вычислениях может вызвать разрушение {g|Encyclopedia:Cybercrypt}инфокрипт{/g}. Но, так как у нас нет в запасе ста часов, придется пренебречь этой процедурой". {n}Паскаль опускает взгляд на инфопластину в руках.{/n} "Незначительное отклонение от ритуала эксплуатации во имя ублажения духа..."

traits.locale_text: "Вынужден уведомить — в целях безопасности варп-секстант нуждается в полной пересборке и обновлении благословений инфокузнецами. Иначе при запуске объем накопившихся ошибок в вычислениях может вызвать разрушение {g|Encyclopedia:Cybercrypt}инфокрипт{/g}. Но, так как у нас нет в запасе ста часов, придется пойти на риск. Я принимаю это решение". {n}Паскаль, уже полноправный владыка инженериума, властно взирает на вас.{/n}

languages.text: "I must inform you that for the purposes of safety, complete reassembly of the warp sextant and updating of its datasmith blessings are required. If this is not done, then at launch the volume of aggregate calculation errors could result in the destruction of the {g|Encyclopedia:Cybercrypt}data-crypts{/g}. But as we do not have one hundred hours at our disposal, we must omit this procedure." {n}Pasqal looks down at the data-slate in his hands.{/n} "A minor deviation from the Rite of Operation for the sake of appeasing the spirit—"
languages.original_text: "Вынужден уведомить — в целях безопасности варп-секстант нуждается в полной пересборке и обновлении благословений инфокузнецами. Иначе при запуске объем накопившихся ошибок в вычислениях может вызвать разрушение {g|Encyclopedia:Cybercrypt}инфокрипт{/g}. Но, так как у нас нет в запасе ста часов, придется пренебречь этой процедурой". {n}Паскаль опускает взгляд на инфопластину в руках.{/n} "Незначительное отклонение от ритуала эксплуатации во имя ублажения духа..."

traits.locale_text: "I must inform you that for the purposes of safety, complete reassembly of the warp-sextant and updating of its datasmith blessings are required. If this is not done, then at launch the volume of aggregate calculation errors could result in the destruction of the {g|Encyclopedia:Cybercrypt}data-crypts{/g}. But as we do not have one hundred hours at our disposal, we must omit this procedure." {n}Pasqal looks down at the data-slate in his hands.{/n} "A minor deviation from the operation ritual for the sake of appeasing the spirit—"

"I must inform you that for the purposes of safety, complete reassembly of the warp-sextant and updating of its datasmith blessings are required. "I must inform you that for the purposes of safety, complete reassembly of the warp-sextant and updating of its datasmith blessings are required. If this is not done, then at launch the volume of aggregate calculation errors could result in the destruction of the {g|Encyclopedia:Cybercrypt}data-crypts{/g}. But as we do not have one hundred hours at our disposal, we must omit this procedure." {n}Pasqal looks down at the data-slate in his hands.{/n} "A minor deviation from the Rite of Operation for the sake of appeasing the spirit—"

languages.text: “我必须告知你，为了安全起见，我们需要彻底重新组装亚空间六分仪，并更新仪器上数据特工的祝福。如果不这么做的话，在启动六分仪的时候，所有汇总而来的计算错误可能会破坏{g|Encyclopedia:Cybercrypt}数据密存器{/g}。不过，考虑到我们并没有一百个小时的时间来做这些事情，我们恐怕不得不跳过这个流程。”{n}帕斯卡低下头，看了看手中的数据板。{/n}“这不过是抚慰机魂的操作流程中，微不足道的小小偏差——”
languages.original_text: "I must inform you that for the purposes of safety, complete reassembly of the warp sextant and updating of its datasmith blessings are required. If this is not done, then at launch the volume of aggregate calculation errors could result in the destruction of the {g|Encyclopedia:Cybercrypt}data-crypts{/g}. But as we do not have one hundred hours at our disposal, we must omit this procedure." {n}Pasqal looks down at the data-slate in his hands.{/n} "A minor deviation from the Rite of Operation for the sake of appeasing the spirit—"

traits.locale_text: “我必须告知你，为了安全起见，我们需要彻底重新组装亚空间六分仪，并更新仪器上数据技师的祝福。如果不这么做的话，在启动六分仪的时候，所有汇总而来的计算错误可能会破坏{g|Encyclopedia:Cybercrypt}数据加密装置{/g}。不过，考虑到我们并没有一百个小时的时间来做这些事情，我们恐怕不得不跳过这个流程。”{n}帕斯卡低下头，看了看手中的数据板。{/n}“这不过是抚慰机魂的操作流程中，微不足道的小小偏差——”

languages.text: 「安全のため、ワープセクスタントは完全に組み立て直され、データスミスの祝福を更新する必要があります。さもなければ、計算ミスで{g|Encyclopedia:Cybercrypt}データ・クリプト{/g}が破壊される可能性があります。しかし、我々には数多の時間はありませんので、この手続きは省略せざるを得ません」{n}パスカルの視線は彼の手元にあるデータスレートに注がれる。{/n}「精霊を鎮めるために、任務の儀礼より、少々逸脱します…」
languages.original_text: "I must inform you that for the purposes of safety, complete reassembly of the warp sextant and updating of its datasmith blessings are required. If this is not done, then at launch the volume of aggregate calculation errors could result in the destruction of the {g|Encyclopedia:Cybercrypt}data-crypts{/g}. But as we do not have one hundred hours at our disposal, we must omit this procedure." {n}Pasqal looks down at the data-slate in his hands.{/n} "A minor deviation from the Rite of Operation for the sake of appeasing the spirit—"

traits.locale_text: 「安全のため、ワープセクスタントは完全に組み立て直され、データスミスの祝福を更新する必要があります。さもなければ、計算ミスで{g|Encyclopedia:Cybercrypt}データ・クリプト{/g}が破壊される可能性があります。しかし、我々には数多の時間はありませんので、この手続きは省略せざるを得ません」{n}パスカルの手元にあるデータスレートに視線が注がれる。{/n}「精霊を鎮めるために、任務の儀礼より、少々逸脱いたします…」

「安全のため、ワープセクスタントは完全に組み立て直され、データスミスの祝福を更新する必要があります。さもなければ、計算ミスで{g|Encyclopedia:Cybercrypt}データ・クリプト{/g}が破壊される可能性があります。しかし、我々には数多の時間はありませんので、この手続きは省略せざるを得ません」{n}パスカルの視線は彼の手元にあるデータスレートに注がれる。{/n}「精霊を鎮めるために、任務の儀礼より、少々逸脱します…」

languages.text: "Ich muss Euch zur Sicherheit informieren, dass die vollständige Neumontage des Warp-Sextanten sowie die Aktualisierung seiner Datenschmied-Segen erforderlich sind. Erfolgt das nicht, könnte die Gesamtmenge der Berechnungsfehler zur Zerstörung der {g|Encyclopedia:Cybercrypt}Daten-Krypten{/g} führen. Aber da wir keine hundert Stunden zur Verfügung haben, werden wir auf die Prozedur wohl verzichten müssen." {n}Pasqal blickt nach unten auf den Datablock in seinen Händen.{/n} "Eine unbedeutende Abweichung vom Betriebsritual zur Besänftigung des Geistes ..."
languages.original_text: "I must inform you that for the purposes of safety, complete reassembly of the warp sextant and updating of its datasmith blessings are required. If this is not done, then at launch the volume of aggregate calculation errors could result in the destruction of the {g|Encyclopedia:Cybercrypt}data-crypts{/g}. But as we do not have one hundred hours at our disposal, we must omit this procedure." {n}Pasqal looks down at the data-slate in his hands.{/n} "A minor deviation from the Rite of Operation for the sake of appeasing the spirit—"

traits.locale_text: "Ich muss Euch zur Sicherheit informieren, dass die vollständige Neumontage des Warp-Sextanten sowie die Aktualisierung seiner Datenschmied-Segen erforderlich sind. Erfolgt das nicht, könnte die Gesamtmenge der Berechnungsfehler zur Zerstörung der {g|Encyclopedia:Cybercrypt}Daten-Krypten{/g} führen. Aber da wir keine hundert Stunden zur Verfügung haben, werden wir auf die Prozedur wohl verzichten müssen." {n}Pasqal blickt nach unten auf den Datablock in seinen Händen.{/n} "Eine kleinere Abweichung von Betriebsritual zur Besänftigung des Geistes ..."

languages.text: « Je dois vous informer que pour des raisons de sécurité, le réassemblage complet du sextant Warp, ainsi que la mise à jour de ses bénédictions de compilateur, sont nécessaires. Autrement, le volume d'erreurs des agrégats de calcul peut entraîner la destruction des {g|Encyclopedia:Cybercrypt}cryptes de données{/g} au démarrage. Toutefois, comme nous ne disposons pas de la centaine d'heures requises, nous devons renoncer à cette procédure. » {n}Pasqal observe la plaque de données dans ses mains.{/n} « Une légère entorse au Rite d'Opération dans le but d'apaiser l'esprit... »
languages.original_text: "I must inform you that for the purposes of safety, complete reassembly of the warp sextant and updating of its datasmith blessings are required. If this is not done, then at launch the volume of aggregate calculation errors could result in the destruction of the {g|Encyclopedia:Cybercrypt}data-crypts{/g}. But as we do not have one hundred hours at our disposal, we must omit this procedure." {n}Pasqal looks down at the data-slate in his hands.{/n} "A minor deviation from the Rite of Operation for the sake of appeasing the spirit—"

traits.locale_text: Je dois vous informer que pour des raisons de sécurité, le réassemblage complet du sextant Warp, ainsi que la mise à jour de ses bénédictions de compilateur, sont nécessaires. Autrement, le volume d'erreur des agrégats de calcul peut entraîner la destruction des {g|Encyclopedia:Cybercrypt}cryptes de données{/g} au démarrage. Toutefois, comme nous ne disposons pas de la centaine d'heures requises, nous devons renoncer à cette procédure. » {n}Pasqal observe la plaque de données dans ses mains.{/n} « Une légère entorse au rituel opérationnel dans le but d'apaiser l'esprit... »

languages.text: «Debo informarle de que, por motivos de seguridad, es necesario reensamblar por completo el sextante de la disformidad y actualizar las bendiciones de los datartífices. De no hacerlo, al arrancar, el volumen de los errores de cálculo acumulados podría causar la destrucción de las {g|Encyclopedia:Cybercrypt}criptas de datos{/g}. Pero, como no contamos con cien horas, debemos omitir este procedimiento». {n}Pasqal baja la mirada a la tablilla de datos que lleva en la mano.{/n} «Una desviación menor del Rito de Operación con el propósito de apaciguar el espíritu...».
languages.original_text: "I must inform you that for the purposes of safety, complete reassembly of the warp sextant and updating of its datasmith blessings are required. If this is not done, then at launch the volume of aggregate calculation errors could result in the destruction of the {g|Encyclopedia:Cybercrypt}data-crypts{/g}. But as we do not have one hundred hours at our disposal, we must omit this procedure." {n}Pasqal looks down at the data-slate in his hands.{/n} "A minor deviation from the Rite of Operation for the sake of appeasing the spirit—"

traits.locale_text: «Debo informarle de que, por motivos de seguridad, es necesario reensamblar por completo el sextante de la disformidad y actualizar las bendiciones de los datartífices. De no hacerlo, al arrancar, el volumen de los errores de cálculo acumulados podría causar la destrucción de las {g|Encyclopedia:Cybercrypt}criptas de datos{/g}. Pero, como no contamos con cien horas, debemos omitir este procedimiento». {n}Pasqal baja la mirada a la tablilla de datos que lleva en la mano.{/n} «Una desviación menor del ritual operativo con el propósito de apaciguar el espíritu...».

languages.text: "Haberdar etmem gerekir ki; güvenlik amacıyla öteboyut sekstantının tamamen yeniden birleştirilmesi ve veri ustası kutsamalarının güncellenmesi gerekmekte. Bu gerçekleştirilmezse kalkış sırasındaki kümelenen hesap hatalarının hacmi, {g|Encyclopedia:Cybercrypt}veri mahzenlerinin{/g} yok olmasına sebebiyet verebilir. Ancak elimizin altında yüz saatimiz olmadığından dolayı bu prosedürü es geçmemiz gerekiyor." {n}Pasqal ellerindeki databelaya bakıyor.{/n} "Ruhu teskin etmek amacıyla Faaliyet Ayini'nde küçük bir esnetme..."
languages.original_text: "I must inform you that for the purposes of safety, complete reassembly of the warp sextant and updating of its datasmith blessings are required. If this is not done, then at launch the volume of aggregate calculation errors could result in the destruction of the {g|Encyclopedia:Cybercrypt}data-crypts{/g}. But as we do not have one hundred hours at our disposal, we must omit this procedure." {n}Pasqal looks down at the data-slate in his hands.{/n} "A minor deviation from the Rite of Operation for the sake of appeasing the spirit—"

traits.locale_text: "Haberdar etmem gerekir ki; güvenlik amacıyla öteboyut sekstantının tamamen yeniden kurulması ve veri ustası kutsamalarının güncellenmesi gerekmekte. Eğer bu gerçekleştirilmezse, kalkış sırasındaki küme hesap hatalarının miktarı, {g|Encyclopedia:Cybercrypt}veri mahzenleri{/g}nin yok olmasına sebebiyet verebilir. Ancak elimizin altında yüz saatimiz olmadığından dolayı bu prosedürü es geçmemiz gerekiyor." {n}Pasqal ellerindeki databelaya bakıyor.{/n} "Ruhu teskin etmek amacıyla Faaliyet Ayininde gerçekleştirilen küçük bir esnek..."
